languages.text: Задача участника пряток лицемерия — обнаружить четырех переодетых слуг, обозначив их инфоклеймом. По словам фрейлины Мейв, ряженные часто прячутся в группах аристократов. Игрища завершатся, как только Вольный Торговец сообщит губернатору о своем желании перейти к финальной части.

traits.locale_text: Задача участников пряток лицемерия — обнаружить четырех переодетых слуг, обозначив их инфоклеймом. Игрища завершатся, как только Вольный Торговец сообщит губернатору о своем желании перейти к финальной части.

languages.text: The objective of the Impostor Hunt is to identify four disguised servants and then mark them using the data-brand. According to the lady-in-waiting Maive, impostors are often found hiding among groups of nobles. The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {rt_mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final stage.
languages.original_text: Задача участника пряток лицемерия — обнаружить четырех переодетых слуг, обозначив их инфоклеймом. По словам фрейлины Мейв, ряженные часто прячутся в группах аристократов. Игрища завершатся, как только Вольный Торговец сообщит губернатору о своем желании перейти к финальной части.

traits.locale_text: A participant in the Impostor Hunt must find four disguised servants and data-brand them. According to the lady-in-waiting Maive, impostors are often found hiding among groups of nobles. The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final part.

A participant in the Impostor Hunt must find four disguised servants and data-brand them. According to the lady-in-waiting Maive, impostors are often found hiding among groups of nobles. The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final part.

The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {rt_mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final stage.

The objective of the Impostor Hunt is to identify four disguised servants and then mark them using the data-brand. The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {rt_mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final stage.

languages.text: Das Ziel der Jagd auf den Hochstapler besteht darin, vier verkleidete Diener zu identifizieren und mit dem Datenbrandeisen zu markieren. Laut der Hofdame Maive verstecken Hochstapler sich häufig in Gruppen von Adligen. Das Spiel endet, sobald {rt_mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dem Gouverneur mitteilt, dass {rt_mf|er|sie} zur letzten Phase übergehen möchte.
languages.original_text: The objective of the Impostor Hunt is to identify four disguised servants and then mark them using the data-brand. According to the lady-in-waiting Maive, impostors are often found hiding among groups of nobles. The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {rt_mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final stage.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel der Jagd auf den Hochstapler besteht darin, vier verkleidete Diener zu identifizieren und mit dem Datenbrandeisen zu markieren. Laut der Hofdame Maive verstecken Hochstapler sich häufig in Gruppen von Adligen. Das Spiel endet, sobald {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dem Gouverneur mitteilt, dass {mf|er|sie} zur letzten Phase übergehen möchte.

languages.text: L'objectif de la Chasse aux imposteurs est d'identifier quatre serviteurs déguisés et de les marquer à l'aide du fer numérique. D'après Maive, la dame d'honneur, ces imposteurs se cachent souvent parmi des groupes de nobles. Le jeu prendra fin dès que {rt_mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dira au gouverneur qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} souhaite passer à la phase finale.
languages.original_text: The objective of the Impostor Hunt is to identify four disguised servants and then mark them using the data-brand. According to the lady-in-waiting Maive, impostors are often found hiding among groups of nobles. The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {rt_mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final stage.

traits.locale_text: L'objectif de la Chasse aux imposteurs est d'identifier quatre serviteurs déguisés et de les marquer à l'aide du fer numérique. D'après Maive, la dame d'honneur, ces imposteurs se cachent souvent parmi des groupes de nobles. Le jeu prendra fin dès que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dira au gouverneur qu'{mf|il|elle} souhaite passer à la phase finale.

languages.text: “狩猎冒牌货”这场游戏的目标，是找到四位伪装成贵族的平民，用数据印章给这些人打上印记。据侍女梅芙所言，只要行商浪人通知总督进入游戏的最后阶段，狩猎冒牌货的游戏就会正式结束。
languages.original_text: The objective of the Impostor Hunt is to identify four disguised servants and then mark them using the data-brand. According to the lady-in-waiting Maive, impostors are often found hiding among groups of nobles. The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {rt_mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final stage.

traits.locale_text: “狩猎冒牌货”这场游戏的目标，是找到四位伪装成贵族的平民，用数据印章给这些人打上印记。据侍女梅芙所言，只要行商浪人通知总督进入游戏的最后阶段，狩猎冒牌货的游戏就会正式结束。
“狩猎冒牌货”这场游戏的目标，是找到四位伪装成贵族的平民，用数据印章给这些人打上印记。据侍女梅芙所言，只要行商浪人通知总督进入游戏的最后阶段，狩猎冒牌货的游戏就会正式结束。

languages.text: El objetivo de la Caza del Impostor es identificar a cuatro sirvientes disfrazados y señalarlos con la marca de datos. Según la dama de honor Maive, los impostores suelen esconderse entre grupos de nobles. El juego terminará cuando {rt_mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente informe al gobernador de que desea continuar con la fase final.
languages.original_text: The objective of the Impostor Hunt is to identify four disguised servants and then mark them using the data-brand. According to the lady-in-waiting Maive, impostors are often found hiding among groups of nobles. The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {rt_mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final stage.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo de la Caza del Impostor es identificar a cuatro sirvientes disfrazados y señalarlos con la marca de datos. Según la dama de honor Maive, los impostores suelen esconderse entre grupos de nobles. El juego terminará cuando {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente informe al gobernador de que desea continuar con la fase final.

languages.text: 偽者探しの目的は、四人の変装した使用人を見つけ出し、データ刻印でマーキングすることである。侍女のメイヴによると、偽物は貴族の集団の中に潜んでいることがよくある。ローグトレーダーが総督に最終段階に進みたいと告げると、ゲームは終了する。
languages.original_text: The objective of the Impostor Hunt is to identify four disguised servants and then mark them using the data-brand. According to the lady-in-waiting Maive, impostors are often found hiding among groups of nobles. The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {rt_mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final stage.

traits.locale_text: 偽者探しの目的は、四人の変装した使用人を見つけ出し、データ刻印でマーキングすることである。侍女のメイヴによると、偽物は貴族の集団の中に潜んでいることがよくある。ローグトレーダーが総督に最終段階に進みたいと告げると、ゲームは終了する。

languages.text: Taklitçi Avı'nın gayesi, kılık değiştirmiş dört hizmetkârı teşhis edip veri damgasıyla işaretlemek. Nedime Maive'e göre taklitçiler, çoğunlukla soylu kümeleri arasında gizleniyor. Hür Tacir valiye son safhaya geçmek istediğini söylediği an oyun bitecek.
languages.original_text: The objective of the Impostor Hunt is to identify four disguised servants and then mark them using the data-brand. According to the lady-in-waiting Maive, impostors are often found hiding among groups of nobles. The game will end as soon as the Rogue Trader tells the governor that {rt_mf|he|she} wishes to proceed to the final stage.

traits.locale_text: Taklitçi Avı'nın gayesi, kılık değiştirmiş dört hizmetkârı teşhis edip veri damgasıyla işaretlemektir. Nedime Maive'e göre taklitçiler çoğu kez soylu kümeleri arasında gizlenir. Hür Tacir valiye son safhaya geçmek istediğini söylediği an oyun biter.
